Documentation for this format

name: DiagnosisAndNotification
title: Diagnosis and notification
description: Represents the collection of baseline patient data, risk factors, and the diagnostic decision, including notifications of confirmed or ruled-out cases.

element.definition: Represents the collection of baseline patient data, risk factors, and the diagnostic decision, including notifications of confirmed or ruled-out cases.
